mapper.select: SELECT rb.no, user_no userNo, title, content, hit, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, group_no, order_no, depth, u.name FROM rboard rb, users u where rb.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc
SELECT rb.no, user_no, title, content, hit, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate, group_no, order_no, depth, u.name FROM rboard rb, users u where rb.user_no = u.no and rb.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into rboard values(seq_rboard_no.nextval, 1, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, seq_rboard_no.currval, 1, 0)
